Image.blitRow: Scale and copy a row of pixels from a texture.
Image.clone:
Return a copy of the current image

Return a copy of the current image
Image.copyFrom:
Sets all pixels in the current image from the other image, which has to be of the same size and
bpp.
Image.doubled: Stretches the image in both directions by 100%
Image.drawIcon: Draw an icon (monochromatic image) using given color
Image.drawImage: Draw given image on the current image
Image.drawLine:
Draw a line

Draw a line
Image.drawRect:
Draw an empty rectangle

Draw an empty rectangle
Image.drawTransparentImage: Draw given image with transparent background on the current image
Image.equals:
Returns true if the provided image is the same as this image,
otherwise returns false.
Image.fill:
Fill entire image with a given color

Fill entire image with a given color
Image.fillRect:
Fill a rectangle

Fill a rectangle
Image.flipX:
Flips (mirrors) pixels horizontally in the current image

Flips (mirrors) pixels horizontally in the current image
Image.flipY:
Flips (mirrors) pixels vertically in the current image

Flips (mirrors) pixels vertically in the current image
Image.getPixel:
Get a pixel color

Get a pixel color
Image.getRows: Copy row(s) of pixel from image to buffer (8 bit per pixel).
Image.height: Get the height of the image
Image.isMono: True if the image is monochromatic (black and white)
Image.overlapsWith: Check if the current image "collides" with another
Image.replace:
Replaces one color in an image with another

Replaces one color in an image with another
Image.rotated: Returns an image rotated by -90, 0, 90, 180, 270 deg clockwise
Image.scroll:
Every pixel in image is moved by (dx,dy)

Every pixel in image is moved by (dx,dy)
Image.setPixel:
Set pixel color

Set pixel color
Image.setRows: Copy row(s) of pixel from buffer to image.
Image.transposed: Returns a transposed image (with X/Y swapped)
Image.width: Get the width of the image
helpers.imageRotated: Returns an image rotated by 90, 180, 270 deg clockwise
image.doubledIcon: Double the size of an icon
image.ofBuffer: Create new image with given content
